title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 171.2 - Record tax collections
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 171.2 - Record tax collections

State Regulations

The district superintendent shall keep a record of the tax
collections in the several school districts under his jurisdiction, with
particular reference to uncollected and returned taxes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
171.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
